item.title: Songs of War Has Always Been Dead; Just Let It Rest in Peace For Once
item.description: On June 14th, 2020, Black Plasma Studios announced the plan to cancel Songs of War Seasons 2 and 3, an animation series 5 years in the making, with a story uncontested by anything else.
